translation.en: [interviewer] Are you a dangerous man?
The question first is whether I committed murder.
translation.es: Primero debería preguntar si cometí un asesinato.

translation.en: And did you?
The courts, they have decided... no.
I have faced trials.
I have faced allegations.
And the courts, they have decided.
That doesn't answer my question, does it?
That's my answer.
There are those who would say you got away with it.
translation.es: Hay quienes dirían que se salió con la suya.

translation.en: That's what Time magazine said.
Perhaps it's true.
After all, I cannot now face trial...
translation.es: Después de todo, ya no podré ir a juicio...

translation.en: anywhere in the world.
-[man] Time to party, girls. -[women laugh]
Come on. [chuckles]
Wait, wait, wait.
Alain!
This is Alain, who I was telling you about.
translation.es: Él es Alain, de quien les platiqué.

translation.en: -Welcome to Kanit House. -Hello.
translation.es: - Bienvenidas a la casa Kanit. - Hola.

translation.en: -Get them a drink, Ajay. -With pleasure.
translation.es: - Invítales un trago, Ajay. - Con gusto.

translation.en: [in French] Looks like it's a fun night.
[in French] The usual, my angel.
[Charles] Relax, we must take the fever down.
[man] I want to go home.
[in French] Can you bring me his bag?
Our home is Bangkok,
but next summer we'll open offices in Paris and Zurich.
translation.es: pero el próximo verano abriremos oficinas en París y Zúrich.

translation.en: We have a network of couriers throughout Asia and Western Europe.
translation.es: Contamos con una red de mensajeros en Asia y Europa Occidental.

translation.en: Which is how we are able to offer such attractive prices.
translation.es: Así es como podemos ofrecer precios tan atractivos.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Oh, it's all right.
Who are you buying for?
Oh, I'm not really buying.
-You're Dutch? -Yes.
But not entirely kwailo, are you?
You're like me.
Yeah. My father's from Indonesia.
translation.es: Sí. Mi padre es de Indonesia.

translation.en: Mine is Indian,
and my mama is from Vietnam.
translation.es: y mi madre es de Vietnam.

translation.en: But listen to me and I am French.
It can be confusing sometimes.
-I'm Alain. -Willem.
-Wim. -My wife, Monique.
translation.es: - Wim. - Ella es mi esposa, Monique.

translation.en: -Oh, hi. -Enchantée.
-Wim. -Don't you want to know the cost?
Okay, yeah.
That one.
Then you are buying for someone.
-Yeah. -What is her name?
-Lena. -Lena?
-Wow, is he a professional? -He is.
You're in very good hands.
-[in Cantonese] How much? -[man replies]
If you'd like, I'm certain I can break him down to... this?
translation.es: Si quieres, puedo hacer que baje el precio a... esto.

translation.en: Thank you. Sorry, I...
I should go. Sorry.
My friend?
How long have you been gone from home?
-A year. -And you have not run out of money yet?
translation.es: - Un año. - ¿Y aún no se quedan sin dinero?

translation.en: No, we've been... sensible.
But still, you want to tell Lena that you love her.
translation.es: Aún así, quieres mostrarle a Lena que la amas.

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
If I told you...
I could have you made a sapphire set in diamonds
translation.es: que puedo hacerte un anillo de platino con zafiro engarzado en diamantes,

translation.en: on a platinum ring for half the price I just showed you,
translation.es: que puedo hacerte un anillo de platino con zafiro engarzado en diamantes, por la mitad del precio que te mostré,

translation.en: what would you say?
[woman, in Dutch] We didn't come out here for jewelry.
translation.es: No venimos aquí por las joyas. HECHO EN HOLANDA

translation.en: [in Dutch] That money could keep us going to Kathmandu, even Kabul.
translation.es: Ese dinero podría llevarnos a Katmandú, incluso a Kabul.

translation.en: [in Dutch] We've got to go home some time.
translation.es: Debemos volver a casa en algún momento.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] You want to go home? -[music plays on radio]
[in Dutch] Just whatever's next for us.
[in Dutch] An apartment?
[in Dutch] A houseboat maybe.
[in Dutch] Like an old married couple, then?
-[in Dutch] An old married couple? -[she yells and laughs]
-Hello, Wim. -[chuckles] Lena.
-Hi. -Hi.
Mon dieu! You're so pretty.
There's no obligation.
Try it on.
[Lena] Wow.
Still a lot of money.
We understand.
You do not need to decide now. Do they?
translation.es: No es necesario que decidan ahora. ¿Cierto?

translation.en: Of course not.
We're going to see you in Bangkok, yes?
Well, all right.
Are you sure it's okay for us to stay?
-Yes, of course it is. -Our home is always open to friends.
translation.es: - Sí, seguro. - Siempre recibiremos a los amigos.

translation.en: Let him buy you the ring, Lena.
translation.es: Deja que te compre el anillo, Lena.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Is that okay?
-[in Dutch] Are you sure? No... -[in Dutch] Yes... Of course.
[Lena, in Dutch] Let's dance!
-Yes? -[woman] Mr. Knippenberg?
Yes, Lawana?
Uh, what time did the others leave?
translation.es: ¿A qué hora se fueron los demás?

translation.en: [sighs] That long, huh?
It's just this gentleman, Mr. Hilgers,
translation.es: Es que este caballero, el Sr. Hilgers,

translation.en: is asking for help in locating his sister-in-law Helena Dekker
translation.es: busca ayuda para localizar a su cuñada, Helena Dekker,

translation.en: and Willem Bloem, her boyfriend.
translation.es: y a Willem Bloem, su novio.

translation.en: To help us, he also enclosed an accompanying package
translation.es: Para ayudarnos, también adjuntó un paquete

translation.en: of holiday photographs and letters home.
translation.es: de fotografías de vacaciones y cartas a casa.

translation.en: But that package has not arrived.
translation.es: Pero ese paquete no ha llegado.

translation.en: How can we help find them if we've lost their damn photographs?
translation.es: ¿Cómo podemos ayudar a encontrarlos si perdimos sus fotografías?

translation.en: Perhaps if you left it with me?
Of course.
What do they say, Yotin?
They talk about the Communists, sir.
In Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia.
They ask if Thailand might also fall to revolution.
translation.es: Preguntan si Tailandia podría caer en una revolución.

translation.en: Well, it might improve the traffic.
[in Thai] Jasmine, sir?
[in Thai] No, thank you.
[in Dutch] Goddamnit.
Yotin, it started at 4:00 and it's already quarter past.
translation.es: Yotin, empezó a las cuatro y ya son las cuatro y cuarto.

translation.en: Surely it would be quicker to walk? This is Athidhaya Road.
translation.es: Sería más rápido caminar. Es la avenida Athidhaya.

translation.en: The athletic club is only three or four blocks north.
translation.es: El deportivo está cuatro calles al norte.

translation.en: -But Mr. Knippenberg-- -I can't just sit here.
translation.es: - Pero Sr. Knippenberg... - No puedo seguir aquí.

translation.en: -Oh. S-Sorry. -[man replies in Thai]
-Herman! -Hi.
Are you all right?
[in Dutch] Ambassador. I'm sorry, the traffic was unbelievable.
translation.es: Embajador. Lo siento, el tráfico era increíble.

translation.en: [in Dutch] We didn't move a yard in 30 minutes, and the rain...
translation.es: No nos movimos en 30 minutos, y la lluvia...

translation.en: This is Knippenberg, my Third Secretary.
translation.es: Este es Knippenberg, mi tercer secretario.

translation.en: Knippenberg, this is Giles Easton, my opposite number with the British.
translation.es: Knippenberg, él es Giles Easton, mi homólogo británico.

translation.en: -How do you do? How do you do? -Good afternoon.
-Good shot! -Ambassador, may I speak with you--
That is Mrs. Knippenberg.
I told Angela to play with De Jongh. As you were late.
translation.es: Le dije a Angela que jugara con De Jongh. Como llegaste tarde.

translation.en: -You didn't tell me she was learning Thai. -Did I not?
translation.es: - No me dijiste que aprendía tailandés. - ¿No?

translation.en: To add to the four or five other languages she already speaks.
translation.es: Quiere agregarlo a los otros cinco idiomas que habla.

translation.en: If she wasn't German, I'd offer her a job!
translation.es: ¡Si no fuera alemana, le ofrecería un trabajo!

translation.en: Well, if you weren't Dutch, I might take it.
translation.es: Si no fueras holandés, podría aceptarlo.

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, may I speak with you briefly on a consular matter?
translation.es: Sr. Embajador, ¿puedo hablar con usted sobre un asunto consular?

translation.en: I thought the office was shut.
Yes, no, of course, but I thought this was rather urgent.
translation.es: Por supuesto, pero esto era muy urgente.

translation.en: Two young Dutch backpackers.
Their families haven't heard from them in over two months.
translation.es: Sus familias no han sabido nada de ellos desde hace meses.

translation.en: Knippenberg, when did you last speak to your mother?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo hablaste por última vez con tu madre?

translation.en: And does she write letters declaring you missing?
translation.es: ¿Y ella nos escribe declarando que estás desaparecido?

translation.en: It's not a diplomat's job to go chasing after longhair bums.
translation.es: No es trabajo de un diplomático perseguir vagabundos melenudos.

translation.en: If it's for anyone, it's for the Thai police.
translation.es: Es trabajo de la policía tailandesa.

translation.en: Pass it on to them if you're so concerned.
translation.es: Dáselo a ellos si estás tan preocupado.

translation.en: Yes, sir, of course, Ambassador.
Oh, good shot.
[Dutch ambassador] Once again, a Dutch triumph over you Brits.
translation.es: Y los holandeses vuelven a vencer a los británicos.

translation.en: [Easton] Yes, please!
Hey, Herman.
[in Dutch] Congratulations.
-Hello. -What was all that?
It's, uh, two missing Dutch.
translation.es: Hay dos holandeses que están desaparecidos.

translation.en: Worried family. But it's a police matter, apparently.
translation.es: Su familia está preocupada. Pero al parecer es asunto de la policía.

translation.en: My mother warned me about this.
translation.es: Mi madre me advirtió sobre esto.

translation.en: "He takes his work too seriously.
translation.es: "Se toma su trabajo muy en serio.

translation.en: He will never take the day off to make love to you
translation.es: Nunca tomará un día libre para hacerte el amor

translation.en: on the 15th floor of the Siam Point."
translation.es: en el piso 15 del Siam Point".

translation.en: Well, it only has eight floors, so technically, she was correct.
translation.es: Pero solo tiene ocho pisos, así que técnicamente tenía razón.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Why are you writing that? Alain said we could stay at his place.
translation.es: ¿Por qué escribes eso? Alain dijo que podíamos quedarnos en su casa.

translation.en: [in Dutch] It's too much. Too generous.
[in Dutch] But Alain is expecting us.
[in Dutch] We can go and see them later.
Wim!
Lena?
Is it you?
Yeah.
I'm Ajay.
-Alain sent me. I work for him. -How did you know it was us?
translation.es: - Alain me envió aquí. Trabajo para él. - ¿Cómo sabes que somos nosotros?

translation.en: Well, there's the orange.
But, really... that, of course.
translation.es: Pero, de verdad... por esto de aquí.

translation.en: Let me help you with your bags. We're all expecting you.
translation.es: Los ayudaré con las mochilas. Los están esperando.

translation.en: We were planning on going to the Santa Cruz first?
translation.es: Bueno, primero vamos al hotel Santa Cruz.

translation.en: The Santa Cruz?
No. Alain wouldn't allow it. Not for his friends.
translation.es: No. Alain no lo permitiría. No para sus amigos.

translation.en: That place gets worse by the week.
translation.es: Ese lugar es peor cada semana.

translation.en: The bathwater comes straight out of the klong.
translation.es: El agua del baño sale directamente del río Mae Klong.

translation.en: People get robbed.
-We don't want to go to the-- -No.
translation.es: - Es que no queremos ser... - No.

translation.en: Welcome to Bangkok. Come on, then. [chuckling]
[Ajay] Look who I found.
-[Charles] Hey. Welcome. -[Monique] Lena!
[Monique] You made it.
-[Lena] Nice to see you. -[Monique] You too. Welcome.
-Welcome to Kanit House. -[Wim] Thank you very much.
translation.es: - Bienvenidos a la casa Kanit. - Gracias.

translation.en: -How was the trip? -Yeah, it was good.
This is Frankie.
-Our friend Dominique. -Bonjour.
-This is for you. For you. -Thank you.
translation.es: - Para ti. Y para ti. - Gracias.

translation.en: -Fresh towel. -Well, thank you very much.
It's really good.
[Dominique] Here, I'll take your bag for you.
[Charles] Come on. We'll wash your dirty things for you.
translation.es: Vengan. Lavaremos lo sucio por ustedes.

translation.en: -[Wim] But it's all dirty. -[Charles] Then we'll wash it all.
translation.es: - Pero todo está sucio. - Lavaremos todo.

translation.en: Won't we, Dominique?
Yes, Alain.
[in Dutch] Thanks for not listening to me.
[Charles] Now, wash, rest. Make yourself at home.
translation.es: Báñense, descansen. Siéntanse como en casa.

translation.en: [in Thai] I'm calling from the Dutch Embassy on behalf of Herman Knippenberg.
translation.es: Llamo desde la embajada holandesa en nombre de Herman Knippenberg.

translation.en: [in Thai] I'd like to talk to someone concerning a missing persons enquiry.
translation.es: Me gustaría hablar con alguien sobre una investigación de desaparecidos.

translation.en: I am very sorry, Mr. Knippenberg,
but the police ask us to call back after the holiday.
translation.es: pero la policía nos pide que llamemos después de las fiestas.

translation.en: -But that's three days. -[woman outside] Lawana!
-Okay, Lawana, you can go. -Sir.
translation.es: - Está bien, Lawana, puedes irte. - Señor.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Knippenberg, you've passed that business onto the police?
translation.es: Knippenberg, ¿pasaste ese asunto a la policía?

translation.en: [in Dutch] Yes, Ambassador.
[in Dutch] Just this moment.
[man, in French] Belgium.
Oh, Mr. Siemons? It's Herman Knippenberg.
I sit on the Intergovernmental Narcotics Liaison with you.
translation.es: Me senté a su lado en el Enlace Intergubernamental de Narcóticos.

translation.en: -[Siemons] Which one are you? -[Herman] Excuse me?
-[Siemons] Nation! -[Herman] Oh! Dutch.
[Herman] I believe the Belgian Embassy
translation.es: Creo que la Embajada de Bélgica también le pide

translation.en: also asks you to manage its more irregular problems.
translation.es: Creo que la Embajada de Bélgica también le pide que gestione sus problemas más irregulares.

translation.en: [Siemons] And what can I do for you, my clog-wearing friend?
translation.es: ¿Qué puedo hacer por ti, querido amigo con zuecos?

translation.en: You know they're not technically your problem?
Yes. The Ambassador says to phone the police,
translation.es: Sí. El embajador dice que es de la policía,

translation.en: but they're on holiday.
[laughs] Yeah, I'll bet they are.
[in Thai] Are you eating?
[in Thai] Soup?
No soup. [speaks Thai]
They expect great things of you, I imagine.
translation.es: Esperan mucho de ti, me imagino.

translation.en: Pardon me?
-You have a master's degree? -Yes.
Advanced International Studies. Taken at Johns Hopkins, Bologna and Washington.
translation.es: "Estudios Internacionales Superiores", en Johns Hopkins, Bolonia y Washington.

translation.en: -You did well? -Yes. A distinction.
translation.es: - Bien ¿y cómo te fue? - Mención honorífica.

translation.en: And now you want to fuck it all up?
translation.es: Y quieres tirarlo a la mierda.

translation.en: Good for you!
-Now, you want to find them? -Well, yes.
Then pay attention.
First, did they even get here?
If they did, there will be documentation. Landing cards.
translation.es: Si fue así, hay documentación. Tarjetas de entrada.

translation.en: [Yotin translates] They definitely arrived, sir.
Check the major Poste Restantes.
These young travelers rely on them for news from home.
translation.es: Los jóvenes viajeros reciben noticias de casa ahí.

translation.en: So, check if they pick up any letters.
[Angela] I thought the Ambassador told you to pass it on to the police?
translation.es: Creí que el embajador te dijo que se lo dejaras a la policía.

translation.en: [Herman] It's just one phone call.
What do you think?
Well, I think it's disobedient.
I don't speak the language, Angela.
translation.es: Yo no hablo el idioma, Angela.

translation.en: [in Thai] Do you have any letters for Willem Bloem or Helena Dekker?
translation.es: ¿Tiene alguna carta para Willem Bloem o Helena Dekker?

translation.en: [man replies in Thai] Six for Bloem from Amsterdam.
Yes, there are letters.
He never collected them?
Did you ever hear of this place?
Santa Cruz Hotel.
It's one of those traveler hostels.
translation.es: Es uno de esos hoteles para jóvenes.

translation.en: It's where I go to buy your pot.
-I don't smoke pot. -[Angela chuckles]
Come.
-Hello. -Who are you, man?
I wonder if you might help me. I work for the Dutch embassy.
translation.es: ¿Podrías ayudarme? Trabajo para la embajada holandesa.

translation.en: I'm looking for two people.
A Miss Helena Dekker
and a Mr. Willem Bloem.
Here on their landing cards it says Santa Cruz Hotel.
translation.es: En sus tarjetas de entrada dice "Hotel Santa Cruz".

translation.en: I wonder if you could look to see if they checked in?
translation.es: Me pregunto si podría ver si se registraron.

translation.en: It should be December 11th or 12th.
translation.es: Debería ser el 11 o 12 de diciembre.

translation.en: They were never here, man.
See for yourself.
Hey, Company Man! Are you done? Or do you need a xerox?
Thank you.
So they arrived in Bangkok,
but never made it to the hotel.
Where did they go?
Perhaps they didn't stick to their schedule, Company Man.
[American accent] Sorry. I just got in.
-Bad jet lag. -[English accent] No hassle, man.
translation.es: - Es el jet lag. - Tranquila, amiga.

translation.en: How long are you staying?
Um... I'm heading to Nepal tomorrow.
Oh. That's cool.
Do you want to split a room maybe? Might be cheaper.
translation.es: ¿Y si compartimos? Debe ser más barato.

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
-All right. -Okay, cool.
Two.
-[English girl] Hey, what's your name? -[American girl] Teresa.
Teresa?
Oh, no. No, thanks.
Hey, you're not a Jesus freak, are you?
Why Nepal if you don't smoke hash?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Nepal si no fumas hachís?

translation.en: Kathmandu is still freak Nirvana.
translation.es: Katmandú sigue siendo el maldito nirvana.

translation.en: I'm not going to Kathmandu.
translation.es: No voy a ir a Katmandú.

translation.en: Sure you don't want to get high?
Why get high, Celia?
I mean, isn't all this a little bit of a trip already?
translation.es: Quiero decir, ¿no es ya toda esta hermosura un viaje?

translation.en: This is...
Maybe you should keep it.
-Do you want it? -Yes, I do.
Seriously, maybe you're, like, my spirit guide or something.
translation.es: En serio, tal vez seas mi guía espiritual o algo así.

translation.en: -Your spirit guide? -Yeah.
Well, your spirit guide needs a fucking drink.
translation.es: La guía espiritual necesita beber algo.

translation.en: So you drink, then?
Follow your spirit guide.
Follow me.
-[Ajay] Hey. -[Celia] Hi.
-I'm Ajay. -Celia.
-Celia? Ah! What are you doing tonight? -Thanks.
-You two are friends? -Yeah.
Hey, there's a party, you guys should both come.
translation.es: Oigan, habrá una fiesta. Deberían venir.

translation.en: -Don't know. -Really, it'll be a cool scene.
translation.es: - No sé. - Será un lugar genial.

translation.en: Hip, you know? Not like the tourists here.
translation.es: A la moda. No como los turistas de aquí.

translation.en: Save it for the next two girls you pick up.
translation.es: Díselo a otras dos mujeres que veas.

translation.en: The next two girls won't be you two though, will they?
translation.es: Las próximas no serán ustedes, ¿o sí?

translation.en: There's a pool. Bring your bikinis and we can have a swim.
translation.es: Hay una piscina. Traigan sus bikinis y nademos ahí.

translation.en: Or don't bring your bikinis, and we can have a swim.
translation.es: O no traigan sus bikinis y aún así nadamos.

translation.en: Let's drop him. He's a creep.
-Celia... -Yeah?
-Let me tell you where I'm headed. -Yeah?
translation.es: - Te voy a decir adónde voy. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: I'm going to a Buddhist monastery.
I was there a year ago and I'm going back, but to live.
translation.es: Estuve ahí hace un año y voy a volver, pero para quedarme a vivir.

translation.en: What? Like a nun?
Not "like". Actually a nun.
translation.es: No igual. En serio seré una.

translation.en: There's a whole bunch of things that I will never get to do again,
translation.es: Hay un montón de cosas que nunca volveré a hacer

translation.en: and I want to do them now.
What, with that guy?
-If you're sure. Okay. -Hey, you're amazing.
translation.es: - Si estás segura. Pues ve. - Eres increíble.

translation.en: So are you. So are you, hon.
-Erm, okay, cool, well, have fun. -I'll see you...
translation.es: - Está bien, genial. Diviértete. - Te veré...

translation.en: -Yeah. -Maybe.
Welcome back. What's your name?
[Teresa] Oh, just some shit.
[Ajay] "Some shit." Great.
[Herman] I did everything you said, Paul. Wim Bloem and Lena Dekker
translation.es: CUATRO MESES DESPUÉS Lo hice, Paul. Wim Bloem y Lena Dekker

translation.en: landed in Bangkok but never checked in to their--
translation.es: aterrizaron en Bangkok pero no llegaron al...

translation.en: [Australian accent] Oi, Siemons! Who's your girlfriend?
-[laughs] Laver. Australia. -Laver, like the tennis player, right?
translation.es: - Laver, de Australia. - Laver, como el tenista, ¿no?

translation.en: Nothing like, mate. More's the fucking pity.
translation.es: Nada parecido, amigo. Es una maldita pena.

translation.en: -"Nippenberg" from the Dutch. -It's "Knippenberg".
[slurring] How long you got left, Ker-nippenberg?
-Left? -Before you go home?
Quite some time. We only arrived six months ago.
translation.es: Bastante tiempo. Llegamos hace solo seis meses.

translation.en: -"We"? -My wife and I.
Jesus. Good luck with that.
Knippenberg has lost a couple of longhairs
translation.es: Knippenberg perdió a un par de melenudos

translation.en: and it's troubling him.
Peace and love, right, Knippenberg?
They're someone's children and they're missing.
translation.es: Son los hijos de alguien y están perdidos.

translation.en: They're work-shy hobos, mate.
I disagree. What they do is hard work.
translation.es: No estoy de acuerdo. Ellos trabajan duro.

translation.en: There's no five-star hotels,
translation.es: No están en hoteles de cinco estrellas

translation.en: no air-conditioning, no drivers.
translation.es: con aire acondicionado, ni tienen choferes.

translation.en: Let's get them all a fucking medal, shall we?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no les damos una medalla?

translation.en: Living in Squalor Medal.
Gentlemen. My apologies.
If you'll excuse me for one moment?
[manager] Your friends are not welcome here.
[man] Let's move over here.
[Laver] I'll tell you a story about longhairs.
It's a good story, once you get to the end. [sniffs]
translation.es: Es una buena historia... cuando llegas al final.

translation.en: I had a pair of murder victims
translation.es: Tuve un par de víctimas de asesinato

translation.en: on a Thai cop mortuary slab.
Aussie hippy kids, Knippenberg.
On their fucking hippy trip.
They'd been killed, set on fire,
their faces disfigured.
They found them in a ditch 58 Ks south of the old city at Ayutthaya.
translation.es: Los hallaron en una zanja a 58 kilómetros al sur de Ayutthaya.

translation.en: I thought you said this was a good story?
translation.es: Creí que era una historia interesante.

translation.en: You got to wait to the end, don't you?
translation.es: Dije que debes esperar al final, ¿no?

translation.en: You ever go to bed with two women at the same time?
translation.es: ¿Te has acostado con dos mujeres al mismo tiempo?

translation.en: The travelers, what happened to the travelers?
translation.es: Los viajeros, ¿qué pasó con los viajeros?

translation.en: -Forgive me, the Belgian attaché... -[whistling] ...is a constant embarrassment.
translation.es: Perdón, pero el agregado belga es una vergüenza constante.

translation.en: Asshole.
-[Australian man] Time to go, mate. -[Laver] My advice?
Don't waste your time with longhairs.
translation.es: No pierdas el tiempo con ellos.

translation.en: -Night, gents. -Where's he going?
He's worried about the curfew.
translation.es: Le preocupa el toque de queda.

translation.en: Right. Aren't you?
I'm staying right here till morning.
translation.es: Me quedaré aquí hasta la mañana.

translation.en: See it through with me, Cloggy.
-Sorry, Paul. -[chuckles]
Mr. Laver, your story about the two Australian travelers?
translation.es: Señor Laver, su historia sobre los dos viajeros australianos...

translation.en: Johnson and Rosanna Watson.
-That was their names? -That's who the cops thought they were.
translation.es: - ¿Eran sus nombres? - Eso dijo la policía.

translation.en: -[man announces over PA in Thai] -But they weren't?
Told you it was a good story.
translation.es: Te dije que era una buena historia.

translation.en: So your bodies, you still have no names for them?
translation.es: Y tus cuerpos, ¿aún no tienen nombres reales?

translation.en: No! Not mine. Not my bodies.
translation.es: ¡No! No son míos. No son mis cuerpos.

translation.en: Not any more, mate. That's someone else's problem.
translation.es: Ya no, amigo. Ya no son mi problema.

translation.en: -Whose? -Whose what?
Whose problem are the two unidentified bodies?
translation.es: ¿De quién son problema los cuerpos no identificados?

translation.en: Whose bloody murder case is it?
translation.es: ¿De quién es el caso de asesinato?

translation.en: Hey! Keep your hair on, you little fucking mouse with clogs on.
It's the Western District Division.
No, wait! Eastern.
-Eastern Division. You're sure? -Sure as eggs, mate.
translation.es: División Este. ¿Estás seguro? - Seguro. - La pareja australiana, ¿dónde están?

translation.en: And the Australian couple, where are they now?
What I've been trying to tell you, mate.
translation.es: Es lo que trato de decirte, amigo.

translation.en: They just showed up.
They've been on some island living on coconuts and fish heads.
translation.es: Estuvieron en alguna isla comiendo cocos y cabezas de pescado.

translation.en: Stupid fucking hippies.
[man] Let's go for this one.
Excellent choice.
[Wim] Excuse me, Alain. Have you seen Lena?
-Pool, I think. -All right, thank you.
translation.es: - En la piscina, creo. - Excelente, gracias.

translation.en: [Monique] I brought you a beer.
-Thank you. Cheers. -Cheers.
[Lena] So you are French?
Québécoise. Canada. The French part.
translation.es: De Quebec, Canadá. La parte francesa.

translation.en: It's amazing, right? The friends you make when you're far away from home.
translation.es: Es asombroso, ¿no? Los amigos que haces cuando estás lejos de casa.

translation.en: -It's the best thing about it, I think. -Yes.
translation.es: - Es lo mejor de todo. - Sí.

translation.en: So, can I ask how you guys ended up here together?
translation.es: ¿Y cómo es que ustedes acabaron juntos aquí?

translation.en: I came for a holiday.
But you didn't go home?
I did not.
He made it impossible for me.
[Charles] Hello, Wim.
-Sleep well? -Yeah, like a child.
[Monique] And you two?
[Lena] We were just friends.
You two are going to get married, yes?
Well, she's not marrying anyone else, that's for sure.
translation.es: Ella no se casará con nadie más, eso es seguro.

translation.en: Well, you're adorable together.
-[Lena] Not as romantic as you and Alain. -I want to help you.
translation.es: - No es tan romántico como tú y Alain. - Quiero ayudarte.

translation.en: Those two stones you just saw me sell?
translation.es: Las dos piedras que me viste vender...

translation.en: Two of those you could sell in Amsterdam for 15,000 guilders.
translation.es: Pueden venderse en Amsterdam por 15 000 florines.

translation.en: Lena says she doesn't care about money.
translation.es: Lena dice que no le importa el dinero.

translation.en: Of course she does. She's young.
translation.es: Claro que le importa. Es joven.

translation.en: And she's a little bit of a hippy.
But she doesn't face the same challenges you do.
translation.es: Pero no enfrenta los mismos desafíos que tú.

translation.en: I know what it's like, Wim, back in Europe.
translation.es: Sé cómo es, Wim, allá en Europa.

translation.en: When you're like us.
There's two men applying for the same position,
translation.es: Si dos hombres se postulan al mismo puesto,

translation.en: they take the whitest one.
translation.es: toman al de piel más clara.

translation.en: It happened to my father all the time.
translation.es: A mi padre le pasaba todo el tiempo.

translation.en: I think every man must one day make a home.
translation.es: Creo que todo hombre debe construir un hogar.

translation.en: And say to himself, "This is my life,
translation.es: Se dice a sí mismo: "Esta es mi vida,

translation.en: this is my love,
and this is who I am."
translation.es: y esto es lo que soy ".

translation.en: But to get there, for men like you and me,
translation.es: Pero para llegar allí, para hombres como tú y yo,

translation.en: we must take our opportunities when they come.
translation.es: hay que aprovechar las oportunidades que llegan.

translation.en: [Lena, in Dutch] Are you sure we should do that?
[Wim, in Dutch] Yeah, I...
[Lena, in Dutch] I know they want to help, but...
[Charles] Are they still out there?
Down in the pool.
[Ajay] How much they got?
More than he told me they had.
translation.es: Más de lo que me dijo que tenían.

translation.en: [Ajay] Oh! Don't you just hate a lie?
You know, we only want to help.
I know.
[Monique] Alain thinks you don't understand.
translation.es: Alain cree que no lo entiendes.

translation.en: I do understand.
He wants us to buy the gems
and sell them for twice what we paid when we get home.
translation.es: y las vendamos al doble cuando regresemos.

translation.en: You don't think that's a good idea?
The money will give you a good start,
translation.es: El dinero les ayudará a empezar

translation.en: a nice life.
-In any case, we really can't afford it. -I don't believe you.
translation.es: - En realidad, no podemos pagarlo. - No te creo.

translation.en: Please, Lena...
just buy the gems.
Hey.
-[Angela] Taxi for Knippenberg! -You took your bloody time.
translation.es: - ¡Taxi para Knippenberg! - Tardaste mucho en venir.

translation.en: -[man announces over PA in Thai] -It's almost curfew.
translation.es: Es casi el toque de queda.

translation.en: [Angela] Scheisse, Herman!
You know, anytime you want to learn to drive,
I'll entirely support that decision.
You can call Yotin if you want someone to bark at.
translation.es: Llama a Yotin si vas a estar ladrando.

translation.en: I can't call Yotin.
[sighs] No one at the Embassy can know what we're about to do.
translation.es: Nadie en la Embajada puede saber lo que haremos.

translation.en: What if we're caught? If you're caught?
translation.es: ¿Y si nos descubren? ¿Y si te descubren?

translation.en: What? Stern rebuke?
Or the chop?
It's very cold in Holland right now, Herman.
translation.es: Hace frío en Holanda en esta época, Herman.

translation.en: Have you thought about that?
Yeah. Have you?
Where to?
The police station. Eastern Division.
translation.es: A la estación de policía. La División Este.

translation.en: A monkey! Oh, my God.
Who is your guest, Ajay?
Hey, I'm Teresa.
-Monique. It's her place. -Oh, um, you're the gem dealer.
translation.es: - Monique. Es su casa. - La comerciante de gemas.

translation.en: I am not. He is the gem dealer.
translation.es: Te equivocas. Él es el comerciante de gemas.

translation.en: My husband Alain.
[Teresa] You live with these guys?
-[Dominique] Yeah, they are cool. -[Teresa] You want to dance?
[Dominique] No, I don't dance.
Soon as it starts ringing, I've gotta go.
translation.es: Tendré que irme cuando empiece a sonar.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
That's okay.
-How do I say "I'm sorry" in French? -[clears throat] Um...
-Je suis désolée? Perfect? -Mm-hmm.
You know, it's crazy but I've never slept with a Frenchman before.
translation.es: Es una locura, pero nunca me he acostado con un francés.

translation.en: [Charles] Dominique?
[in French] Monique needs you to bring up more ice.
[in French] Yes.
-So you are Teresa? -I am.
translation.es: - Así que tú eres Teresa. - La misma.

translation.en: And you are American?
[Charles] Where are you heading?
[Teresa] Nepal, to a monastery.
If you're going to be a nun,
why do you have all these travelers' cheques?
[chuckles] Well, they're not for me. They're for the monastery.
translation.es: No son para mí. Son para el monasterio.

translation.en: [Charles] The cost of pursuing Nirvana goes up and up.
translation.es: El costo de perseguir el nirvana sube y sube.

translation.en: So, you want to renounce the world entirely?
No, I don't renounce the world.
translation.es: No, no he renunciado al mundo.

translation.en: Just the people who run it.
On my heart, you are too young to lock yourself away.
translation.es: Querida, eres muy joven para encerrarte.

translation.en: Too young, too beautiful.
Your life too full of opportunity.
translation.es: Tu vida está demasiado llena de oportunidades.

translation.en: With you, you mean?
Did Ajay tell you what I do?
translation.es: ¿Ajay te dijo a lo que me dedico?

translation.en: Yes. It's gems, right?
I buy. I sell. And from time to time, others sell for me.
translation.es: Las compro. Las vendo. Y de vez en cuando, otros las venden por mí.

translation.en: I am not going to smuggle gemstones for you.
translation.es: No voy a contrabandear piedras preciosas por ti.

translation.en: -I'm taking vows. -And yet I find you here,
translation.es: - Tomaré los votos. - Pero te encuentro aquí,

translation.en: openly offering yourself to my friend Dominique.
I'm not a nun yet.
In which case, may I ask, have you been to...
translation.es: En cuyo caso, puedo preguntar, ¿has estado en...

translation.en: What shall we call them? Nightclubs here?
Oh, you mean the sex shows?
[chuckles] Well?
[sighs] I have not.
Then on this last night,
before you retreat from the world,
perhaps you should.
[Teresa howls and laughs] Oh, my God!
Heartwarming. [chuckles]
I'm gonna go.
Take it easy, Teresa.
Fuck! Fucking idiot.
You think I don't know how a fucking downer comes on?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no sé qué me pasa?

translation.en: -Don't touch me! Help! -[spectators cheering and whistling]
He's Alain, he's Ajay! They fucking drugged me!
translation.es: ¡Él es Alain y él es Ajay! ¡Me drogaron!

translation.en: Get her in the car.
[Charles] You draw attention to yourself, Teresa.
It's not prudent.
Drank too much.
[pants] Help.
[Teresa] Please take it all. Please take it.
-Won't the monastery miss it? -[Ajay chuckles]
translation.es: ¿Y al monasterio no le hará falta?

translation.en: You fucking asshole.
[Charles] You're vulgar.
You throw yourself at men the way you throw yourself at religion.
translation.es: Te lanzas a los hombres del mismo modo que a la religión.

translation.en: You cannot buy your way off the wheel, Teresa.
translation.es: No puedes comprar tu salida de este mundo, Teresa.

translation.en: It is very American of you to think otherwise.
translation.es: Es una forma muy occidental de pensar.

translation.en: And as you may know,
Americans do not prosper in this part of the world.
translation.es: los estadounidenses no prosperan en esta parte del mundo.

translation.en: -Fuck you. -[Ajay] Hey, where are we going?
Aren't we leaving her at the Santa Cruz?
translation.es: No podemos llevarla al Santa Cruz.

translation.en: Where shall we leave her?
She's seen too much.
And you saw, she's not afraid to complain.
translation.es: Y lo viste, no tiene miedo de hablar.

translation.en: She will only be another reckless Westerner who took drugs and went swimming.
translation.es: Será otra imprudente occidental que se drogó y fue a nadar.

translation.en: [sighs] Once, I stole a taxi in Peshawar.
translation.es: Una vez robé un taxi en Peshawar.

translation.en: I had to take it to Tehran, you see?
The driver refused so I had to dose him.
translation.es: El conductor se negó, así que tuve que sedarlo.

translation.en: I put him in the trunk...
and after some time,
he awoke and began to moan and thump.
translation.es: se despertó y comenzó a gemir y golpear.

translation.en: It was upsetting the other passengers,
so I stopped at a river to check on him.
translation.es: así que me detuve en un río para revisarlo.

translation.en: But he had suffocated,
so I took him out and helped him into the water.
translation.es: así que lo saqué y lo metí en el agua.

translation.en: I expected to feel great guilt,
but I did not,
I felt free.
Free from judgment.
Mine.
God's.
It was all entirely...
without tragedy.
Did they come looking for you? Did they catch you?
translation.es: ¿Y no empezaron a buscarte? ¿No te atraparon?

translation.en: Nobody has ever caught me, Ajay. No one.
translation.es: Jamás me ha atrapado nadie, Ajay. Nadie.

translation.en: We can do it together.
Are you gonna hurt me?
No. Better than that.
[Teresa] Oh, compassionate ones.
This person is going from this world
translation.es: esta persona va de este mundo

translation.en: to the other shore.
She is leaving this world.
She is dying without choice.
She has no friends.
She is suffering greatly.
She has no refuge.
She has no protector.
She has no allies.
The light of this life has set.
translation.es: La luz de esta vida se ha puesto como el sol.

translation.en: She is embarking on a great battle.
translation.es: Ella se embarca a una gran batalla.

translation.en: She is seized by the great evil spirit.
translation.es: La asesinó el gran espíritu maligno.

translation.en: She is terrified by the messengers
translation.es: Ella está aterrorizada por los mensajeros

translation.en: of the Lord of Death.
She is entering existence after existence.
translation.es: Ella va de existencia en existencia.

translation.en: Because of her karma, she is helpless.
translation.es: Debido a su karma, está indefensa.

translation.en: The time has come when she must go alone
translation.es: Ha llegado el momento en que debe ir sola,

translation.en: without a friend.
-[Lena sighs and groans] -[Wim] Lena. Shh.
[Angela] Are those dead bodies?
Yes. Burned, I think.
What's wrong with us?
Monique? Please.
[Wim] And the remains of their clothing.
Look!
My God.
It's them.
-[Lena] Alain, please help us. -[Charles] Shh.
Why has no one done anything?
